participant_1.background:
I make sure to get plenty of exercise, even if my diet is not the best.
i like to build furniture.
my husband is a cop.
my favourite colour is green.
I'm looking forward to moving on to the next chapter in my life.

participant_2.background:
I am passionate about being a good dog parent to my collie.
i do not want a job.
my job involves building drones.
I frequently drink chocolate milk, which is not very good for my weight.
I remember playing street hockey with my friends in the summer.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Pretty good, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well! Just got back from a long walk with my dog.
I'm sure your dog is happy about that! I have a collie named Charlie, and he loves going for walks.
I love collies! They're such sweet dogs. What kind of work do you do?
I build drones for a living. It's a lot of fun, but it can be a little stressful sometimes.
That sounds like an interesting job! I've always been interested in drones, but I've never had a chance to build one.
It's definitely something that anyone can do if they're willing to put in the time and effort.
I'm sure I would be terrible at it, but it would be fun to try.
It's never too late to learn a new skill!
I know, I know. I'm just not sure if I have the time or the patience.
Well, if you ever do decide to give it a try, I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll keep it in mind.
